Hello again everyone! I saw that others were doing an early black friday, so I thought we might as well jump on the trian! This deal will last all the way to the actual day, Friday, 29 November! We are giving you **50% off** on our already cheap hosting packages for the **initial** billing period (**monthly, yearly**). Anyways here's some information about us if you are wondering!

HostUp's VPS plans are located in the **Netherlands** and is a perfect solution for both businesses and personal needs. We utilize SSD storage in **RAID** 1 to ensure that even if one of our drives fail your data is still safe. Our memory is also ECC rated. Along side this we give you full root access & a **dedicated IPv4** IP to your VPS.

You can view our previous offers for questions: [1](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/160129/hostup-ultra-fast-ssd-vps-only-7-year-1000-gbps-ddos-protection-layer1-7-1-gbps-uplink#latest), [2](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/160367/hostup-ultra-fast-ssd-vps-3-5-2gb-ecc-ram-voxility-ddos-protection-layer1-7-1-gbps-uplink#latest)

There are some things that have changed since last time :) This time we are offering VPS services that are DDoS protected through Hydra. This will give you 100 Gbps included DDoS protection, Layer 3-4. Dual uplinks has also been added for more stability. If you were a customer you will know that this resulted in some [downtime](https://twitter.com/hostup/status/1185490631323521025) when our datacenter installed them, but I am sure it was all worth while, and SLA was given :)
